[b][color=white]New Project?[/color][/b]
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#FF66FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] posted a thread with 3 images which resemble some type of characters. [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1093501][b][color=white]Roger Waters[/color][/b][/url] then eventually found the hidden page ([url=http://hackforums.net/battle.php]http://hackforums.net/battle.php[/url]) that [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#FF66FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] teased at and after 12 pages of discussions, [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#FF66FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] told us there will be another thread for the next phase of the project. Who's excited for this next project? From my interpretation, I'm thinking a Pokemon Go style battle with 3 factions. Excited and eager to see what comes next![i][size=x-small][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5398896] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]New Policy Addition - Username Visible Characters[/color][/b]
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#FF66FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] has added a new rule for usernames that a member must have at least four visible characters in their username or else they risk penalties. If you do not meet the requirements of four visible characters, change your username right away before actions are taken against your account.[i][size=x-small][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5396293] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

    [color=transparent]       [/color]

[list][b][color=white][u]Announcement Threads[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5398896][b]What are these?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#FF66FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url]
What are these mysterious creatures that Omni has introduced to the community? Can you find the new hidden link?

[url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5394128][b]Monero Award?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#FF66FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url]
Have you heard of the Monero crypto currency? Do you think Omniscient should add a new crypto coin award?[/list][/list]

[list][b][color=white][u]Informational Threads[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5385186][b]Confound's Freshman Year Help Desk | Q+A, Tips, + More[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2920830][b][color=#FFFFFF]Confound[/color][/b][/url]
Being a freshman in college can be tough for some. Having to make new friends, if you dorm you are away from home, and you finally get to be treated as an adult. If you need assistance on how to make your first year great, come check out this thread.

[url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5341267][b]Parker's Nutrition & Dieting Mega Thread [Beginner Friendly][/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2945848][b][color=#00AAFF]Parker[/color][/b][/url]
A beginner friendly mega-thread in regards to nutrition and dieting. Need some help on this matter? Come check out this awesome thread.

[url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5401563][b]The Complete Guide To Choosing The Right VPN Provider[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3256619][b][color=black]Max Pâ„¢[/color][/b][/url]
A short but helpful guide on how to choose the right VPN provider. Staying safe and secure on the internet definitely feels good. If staying anonymous online is what you are interested in, a VPN will help a ton; knowing which one to pick is even better.

[url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5400626][b][Tutorial] Fast,free and easy way to check for system infections.[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=898091][b][color=#EFEFEF]Fá»™rcÉ™d[/color][/b][/url]
Do you think you have an infection? Just want to quickly check your computer for any? The user Fá»™rcÉ™d has created a tutorial on just how to do that. The thread includes download links, pictures, and a YouTube video to help users who are struggling with the instructions.

[url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5401239][b][Tutorial]PHP CGI ARGUMENT INJECTION using Metasploit[/Noob-Friendly][/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2860712][b][color=#EFEFEF]spirited_wolfâ„¢[/color][/b][/url]
This thread is not for people who are new to Metasploit. If you have experience then this is something that may interest you. Even if you are new do not shy away from what I originally said. There are a few references in here to get you started.

[url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5399279][b]MMORPG | Best&Cool Games to Play | A-Z List | Pick up your Game | 20+ Games[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2859279][b][color=#EFEFEF]Brusk[/color][/b][/url]
A collection of various different MMORPG in one thread. Looking for something new to play? Come on in!

[url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5401280][b][Tutorial] DayZ Standalone .60 - SUICIDE EVERYWHERE + EVERYTIME GLITCH[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=394883][b][color=#99FF00]darealburn[/color][/b][/url]
This does not sound like a happy topic, but do not worry it is game related.[/list][/list]

[list][b][color=white][u]Entertaining Threads[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5401733][b]My Pokemon Shiny Hunting Journey [Updated: 9/10/16][/b][/url] - [url=PROFILE_URL][b][color=#EFEFEF]Ariana[/color][/b][/url]
Come check out Ariana's shiny Pokemon hunt!

[url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5400380][b]What did you do for your 16th birthday?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3068835][b][color=#EFEFEF]bustagod[/color][/b][/url]
What did you do on your 16 birthday? Go out and party? Hang out with the fam? Come share how you spent your awesome day here.

[url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5402211][b]What do you do if you accidentally killed someone?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2073436][b][color=#00AAFF]Skilo[/color][/b][/url]
Ouch. You just accidentally killed someone. That does not seem too good. What would you do in this situation?

[url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5402512][b]Hillary Clinton Faints![/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2178266][b][color=#00AAFF]Rod$[/color][/b][/url]
Some hateful comments here in the thread. What do you think about the what happened to Hillary Clinton?

[url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5402507][b]I made a YouTube Vlog[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1700066][b][color=#00AAFF]Gary.[/color][/b][/url]
Come check out Gary's awesome new vlog video.

[url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5399146][b]Anyone else love the sound of typing on a keyboard?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1522601][b][color=#00AAFF]ZUGGY[/color][/b][/url]
Click, click, clack goes the sound of your keyboard. Does this sound amaze you? Does it make you feel all tingly inside?[/list][/list]

    [hr]
    
[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v3/Interview/308.png[/img]

[color=#1E90FF][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]Interview[/font][/size][/color] [color=white][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]-[/font][/size][/color] [size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2945848]Parker[/url][/font][/size][/align][spoiler=][align=left]

[hr]

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] Parker, I'd like to welcome you to the 308th edition of the HF News! Do you have any shoutouts you want to make before we begin?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2945848][color=white][b]Parker:[/b][/color][/url] Regulus hope he pulls through.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] You've recently been awarded the Cuddly and Cute award by Omni. How'd you managed to get him to do that?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2945848][color=white][b]Parker:[/b][/color][/url] Well I really really really wanted a sticky award just as anyone would so I figured I would beg omniscient to take a look at it aleast and well the way I worded it to was kinda poemish. And he took it the wrong way. ðŸ˜Š But I'm not complaining.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] Why did you want the sticky award? What thread was it for? Are you happy you got the cuddly and cute award instead of the sticky one? ðŸ˜
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2945848][color=white][b]Parker:[/b][/color][/url] Well I wanted the sticky award because you know I'm kinda an awardaholic not a successful one either. #brokeboy The thread I was aiming for was my nutrition based fitness thread was hoping it would of cleaned up some of the stupid same question over and over threads "how do I lose weight" but it's whatever. Also a course I'm happy I got the cute and cuddly award ðŸ˜ I got a new set of guidelines to live by and that's to be cute as possible.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] So you like to maintain a healthy lifestyle? Were you always interested in doing this or did this happened recently?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2945848][color=white][b]Parker:[/b][/color][/url] Meh I used to be fatty had one of those so glorified transformations where you drop 30 pounds or so, but basically fell in love with lifting and tracking my calories during the process. So that was about a year or ago when I started tracking and losing weight so I'd say it was recent but I can see myself being involved with it forever. Even got plans to compete

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] Was it hard to stay motivated when you were starting out?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2945848][color=white][b]Parker:[/b][/color][/url] First two weeks probably most demotivating thing ever just got depressed couldn't do big boy weight and was just a big let down. Found some youtubers and just kept going until I saw some tiny ass muscle in my arms and got motivated as hell. Bradley Martyn will always be my favorite youtuber to because he got me through those first two weeks.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] What would you recommend people to do if they want to get started?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2945848][color=white][b]Parker:[/b][/color][/url] Start with 30 minute workouts learn the form, get a hang of how everything works. Nutrition should become last the thing you start to worry about. Find youtubers they like that are fitness based they will give tips and really give an idea what type of community your in. Also learn the anatomy doesn't hurt to know what your training each day. :p

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] Do you actually enjoy living a healthy lifestyle or do you still consider it as something painful to keep up with like in the beginning?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2945848][color=white][b]Parker:[/b][/color][/url] Enjoy living my "healthy lifestyle" not really healthy haha I still eat whatever I want just limit how much I eat. But yes I enjoy tracking and eating what I need each day. Gives me something to do when I usually would be bored.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] I can agree. Thanks a lot for your time! Do you have anything else you want to say before we wrap this up?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2945848][color=white][b]Parker:[/b][/color][/url] Not really haha private message me if you want help with nutrition. ðŸ‘

[/spoiler][/align]

    [b][color=white]Monday Releases[/color][/b]
    From this edition forward, unless an emergency of some sort occurs, we'll be publishing every Monday. No more random days of publication, from Monday to Thursday to Tuesday :P We'll try our very best to get it published every Monday. We know a lot of you hate that it comes out late due to a lot of things happening recently but hopefully everything will go a lot smoother now.

    [color=transparent]   [/color]

    [align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v3/WorldNews.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Pandas Make it off Endangered List[/color][/b]
The work of conservationists has finally paid off: pandas are off the endangered-species list. Due to a rebound of the panda population in China, the official status of the animal has changed from â€œendangeredâ€ to â€œvulnerable.â€ Estimates now put the population of pandas at 1,864 adults and 196 cubs. The Chinese governmentâ€™s efforts to save the panda have shown they are willing to protect their national animal. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-china-37272718] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Largest Strike in Human History Takes Place in India[/color][/b]
Prime Minister Narendra Modiâ€™s economic policies caused tens of millions of public-sector workers to go on strike on September 2. The Indian prime minister has pushed for greater privatization because of the money it could raise, but those in state-run offices have come out against it. Although not verified, union officials claimed 180 million government workers were on strike. The particular worry from those striking is that privatization will jeopardize their employment. The unions would also like a hike in the minimum wage. Currently, the minimum wage of India is 6,396 rupees per month ($96).[i][size=x-small][url=http://www.aljazeera.com/news/2016/09/millions-indian-workers-strike-wages-160902131706206.html] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]UK Government Aims to ban Plastic Microbeads[/color][/b]
The tiny beads found in many cosmetic items will soon be banned in the UK. Multiple cosmetic companies have promised to voluntarily phase out the beads by 2020, but the UK government is aiming for a ban in 2017 instead. The reasoning behind the ban is that the beads are thought to damage the environment through environmental build-up and possible entrance into the food chain. The microbeads are indeed plastic, and a single shower can cause up to 100,000 plastic particles to enter the ocean. This ban follows the USâ€™ microbead ban which was announced in late December of 2015.[i][size=x-small][url=http://www.bbc.com/news/uk-37263087] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

    [color=transparent]    [/color]

    [align=center][img]http://hackforums.news/assets/v3/TechNews/Gladly.png[/img][/align]

[align=left][url=https://gizmodo.com/itt-is-officially-closing-1786243058?rev=1473164252541][b]ITT Technical Institute is Completely Shutting Down [/b][/url]
Private, for-profit college ITT Tech will be finally shutting its doors after 50 years of operation, after a step in by the U.S. Federal Government. This comes shortly after the U.S. Department of Education cracked down and stripped it of its multi-billion dollar Federal aid, resulting in the school stopping enrollment entirely. According to current students and faculty, ITT Tech did not really explain to them what was happening, with one staff member even claiming that â€œNo one knows whatâ€™s going on". Students of the school must now either transfer their credits to a new school or attempt to get their money back, as all ITT Tech campuses will no longer be in service. Those who took loans from the school may also be entitled to loan forgiveness for the pricey schools' tuition.

[url=http://www.theverge.com/2016/9/7/12758236/apple-iphone-7-announced-features-price-release-date][b]Apple Unveils iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus[/b][/url]
On the 7th of the month, Apple has appropriately decided to unveil their newest phones in the iPhone lineup: the iPhone 7, and iPhone 7 Plus. With this unveiling comes both slight tweaks, and very drastic changes to the coveted smartphone's arsenal. Those who watch plenty of media on their iPhones will now be able to enjoy their content with full stereo sound, with one speaker being located at the bottom of the phone, and the other where the ear piece is located at the top-front of the phone. Speaking of the bottom of the iPhone, Apple has revealed that both new iPhones will no longer have a 3.5 mm headphone jack, meaning your favorite pair of headphones will no longer work out of the box. Those who want to keep using their traditional headphones must purchase an adapter sold by Apple for an additional $9, although the phones will come with earbuds that plug directly into the charging port. Another big change to the phones was the changing of the iconic home button, which is now force sensitive like the trackpad Apple features in their newest MacBook Air. The change Apple fans may really love to hear is the overhaul of their camera system. This year, the iPhone 7 Plus will feature a new dual camera system similar to the one seen in LG's V10 smartphone. The iPhone 7 Plus' dual cameras adds the capability to zoom in at twice the normal capacity, with no loss to picture quality. Along with this, the cameras swap automatically, meaning the phone will choose the right one for the job. The most affordable 32GB model of the iPhone 7 will retail at about $650, while the 32GB iPhone 7 Plus starts at $769, going all the way up to $969 for the 256GB model. The phones are set to release on September 16th.

[url=http://www.zdnet.com/article/now-you-can-buy-a-usb-stick-that-destroys-laptops/][b]Chinese Company Invents USB Drive that Destroys Your Devices[/b][/url]
What was once just an idea, may now endanger the devices, citizens, companies, and practically any unprotected device with access to a USB port. Hong-Kong based company USBKILL, has released their lastest thumb drive, capable of charging electricity inside the device, and sending it all at once to the device it is plugged into, frying it instantly. This device won't just affect computers, but really any device left unprotected with a USB port. This includes, televisions, printers, game consoles, copy machines, and plenty of larger electronics. According to the company, tech makers that build protection into their devices cannot be affected by the device, with Apple being a notable company that protects against electrical attacks. The special USB drive dubbed USB Kill retails for $56, and can also come with their so-called Test Shield, which allows the device to be tested without frying your own devices.

[/align]

    [color=transparent]      [/color]

    [align=center][img]http://hackforums.news/assets/v3/GamingNews.png[/img][/align]
[b][url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/ps4-pro-specs-release-date-and-price-confirmed/1100-6443352/][color=white]PS4 Pro Specs and Price Revealed[/color][/url][/b]
As expected, Sony revealed the PS4 Pro at their conferences this past week and confirmed pricing, specs, and some other details. It will launch on November 10, 2016 and cost $399. During the PlayStation Meeting event, Andrew House, president and group CEO of Sony Computer Entertainment, discussed Sony's decision to pursue 4K and HDR, which are two of the major new features the PS4 Pro enables. Cerny went on to show off a number of games running on PS4 Pro and displayed on a 4K display. Sony Bend's Days Gone was used to show how HDR can deliver "a level of photorealism that you've never experienced in a game." However, Cerny reassured the audience that the PS4 Pro isn't just for people with a 4K or HDR capable display. Developers can make use of the extra power to improve visual fidelity on standard 1080p TVs. The PS4 Pro will also come with a 1TB hard drive, doubled GPU power, and technology adapted from AMD Polaris graphical architecture. The full specs for the PS4 Pro can be viewed [url=http://pastebin.com/14bM7MB8]here[/url].

[b][url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/mario-coming-to-iphone-and-ipad-in-super-mario-run/1100-6443382/][color=white]Mario Coming to iPhone and iPad in Super Mario Run[/color][/url][/b]
Apple has recently announced that Nintendo will be launching a Mario game on iOS called Super Mario Run! The newly announced game will be an autorunner in which Mario sprints from the left to the right while players tap the screen to make him jump over obstacles and collect coins and power-ups! Initially, there won't be many power-ups, but as the game progresses, power-ups will become available and change how the mechanics work. However, the goal remains the same. Get to the flagpole as quickly as possible. Mario creator Shigeru Miyamoto appeared on stage during the Apple event to talk about the game and its three different modes of play. "Super Mario Run offers three different game modes. The first mode features challenging courses for you to complete. In the second mode, you challenge the play data of other people's completed courses. You compete to see who can finish the course with the most style! In the third mode, you can create your own Mushroom Kingdom using coins collected by playing the first two game modes." The game will be available in December 2016.


[b][url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/new-doom-trailer-teases-deathmatch-private-matches/1100-6443442/][color=white]New Doom Trailer Teases Deathmatch and More[/color][/url][/b]
Bethesda has announced the contents of the upcoming free update for Doom! It will include Deathmatch, Private Matches, and Arcade Mode. They also released a short teaser which, along with gameplay, showcases information and a stream where further additions will be discussed. The stream is being held on September 13 at 11AM PT and will be hosted on the Xbox Twitch page. Marty Stratton and Hugo Martin will be in charge of running the stream to talk about the game. Before this news, Bethesda provided a few details about the new modes mentioned previously. "Deathmatch brings free-for-all mayhem to DOOMâ€™s fast-paced multiplayer, and arrives as part of Free Update 3 this month. Private Matches are also coming in that update, allowing you and your friends to create private multiplayer matches where you determine the maps and modes," it explains on its website. The trailer with more information can be viewed [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RZgqWmE57ZU]here[/url].
